column4: 1 more question that's bugging me then I'll leave you fine folks alone... What's the keyboard shortcut to shortcuts on my panel (in Natty) http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1428870
Like in Windows you can Win+1 to launch the first item in Quick Launch. Is there something similar for Ubuntu?
I'm using Natty Narwhal so the launcher trick isn't working
